oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All For the Hall featuring Keith Urban at the Sommet Center
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); fund raising; Urban, Keith, 1967-; Gill, Vince; Paisley, Brad; Hill, Faith, 1967-; Little Big Town (Musical group); Aldean, Jason; Lady Antebellum (Musical group);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (orange, navy and black on white) announcing All for Hall, benefit for the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum, starring Keith Urban, Vince Gill, Brad Paisley, Faith Hill, Taylor Swift, Little Big Town, Jason Aldean, Lady Antebellum at the Bridgestone Arena (formerly the Sommet Center) on October 13.
